Catalog Querry Functions

Functions to perform catalog queries.

catalog_querry.get_2mass_catalog(coord, radius=<Quantity 1. arcmin>)

Query 2MASS Catalog

Function to get 2MASS catalog at a given coordinate and radius using Vizier.

Parameters:

  • coord (SkyCoord) – Coordinates of the center of the search.

  • radius (Quantity) – Radius of the search.

Returns:

Table of the 2MASS catalog.

Return type:

Table

catalog_querry.get_catalog(catalog_name, coord, radius=<Quantity 1. arcmin>)

Get Catalog

Function to get catalog at a given coordinate and radius using Vizier.

Parameters:

  • catalog_name (str) – Name of the catalog.

  • coord (SkyCoord) – Coordinates of the center of the search.

  • radius (Quantity) – Radius of the search.

Returns:

Table of the catalog.

Return type:

Table

catalog_querry.get_random_coordinates()

Get Random Coordinates

Function to generate a random SkyCoord object.

Returns:

Random SkyCoord object.

Return type:

SkyCoord

catalog_querry.get_random_coordinates_gal()

Get Random Coordinates in Galactic Coordinates

Function to generate a random SkyCoord object in Galactic coordinates within -5 < b < 5.

Returns:

Random SkyCoord object in Galactic coordinates within -5 < b < 5.

Return type:

SkyCoord

catalog_querry.get_sdss_catalog(coord, radius=<Quantity 1. arcmin>)

Query SDSS Catalog

Function to get SDSS catalog at a given coordinate and radius using Vizier.

Parameters:

  • coord (SkyCoord) – Coordinates of the center of the search.

  • radius (Quantity) – Radius of the search.

Returns:

Table of the SDSS catalog.

Return type:

Table
